6.5 The MLWorks runtime

6.5.2 Irix

The default installation procedure for Irix installs a version of the MLWorks runtime, mlrun, that is dynamically linked to X Window System libraries and Motif libraries. The following shared libraries must be available on your Irix system for the runtime to work:

Irix

libX11.so.1, libXext.so, libXm.so.1, libXmu.so, libXt.so, libc.so.1, libm.so

If you do not have access to these libraries on your system, please contact Harlequin MLWorks Support.

We do not distribute a statically linked Irix runtime.

MLWorks Release Notes version 2.0 - 28 Aug 1998
